price: Maka tatkala mereka telah kembali kepada ayah mereka (Ya`qūb) mereka berkata, "Wahai ayah kami, kami tidak akan mendapat sukatan (gandum) lagi, (jika tidak membawa saudara kami), sebab itu biarkanlah saudara kami pergi bersama-sama kami supaya kami mendapat sukatan dan sesungguhnya kami benar benar akan menjaganya".
arabic: فَلَمَّا رَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَبِيهِمۡ قَالُواْ يَٰٓأَبَانَا مُنِعَ مِنَّا ٱلۡكَيۡلُ فَأَرۡسِلۡ مَعَنَآ أَخَانَا نَكۡتَلۡ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falammā rajaʿū ilā abīhim qālū yāabānā muniʿa minnā al-kaylu fa-arsil maʿanā akhānā naktal wa-innā lahu laḥāfiẓūna
